# APT repository for DevTunnel-CLI

This branch is used by GitHub Pages to serve the APT repo for `sudo apt install devtunnel-cli`.

**Do not edit manually.** The [release workflow](https://github.com/maiz-an/DevTunnel-CLI/blob/main/.github/workflows/release.yml) updates this branch on each release.

To install on Debian/Ubuntu: run the [install script](https://github.com/maiz-an/DevTunnel-CLI/blob/main/scripts/install.sh) once to add the repo, then `sudo apt install devtunnel-cli`.
